author: cnbc.com
title: Inseego: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Inseego Corp. (INSG) on Tuesday reported a loss of $8.1 million in its first quarter.
The San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 13 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 3 cents per share.
The holding company posted revenue of $46.7 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, the company's shares hit $2.09. A year ago, they were trading at $1.83.
